Description: WattzOn is a free online tool to quantify, track, compare and understand the total amount of energy needed to support all of the facets of user's lifestyles with the goal of helping users find ways to reduce your personal power consumption. The WattzOn API is a RESTful API that allows developers to integrate WattzOn with other tools and to design their own applications. WattzOn allows developers to access data as well as upload new power meter readings.
